verses.verse: "Sing,<WH7442> barren,<WH6135> you who didn't<WH3205> bear; break forth<WH6476> into singing,<WH7440> and cry aloud,<WH6670> you who did not travail with child:<WH2342> for more<WH7227> are the children<WH1121> of the desolate<WH8074> than the children<WH1121> of the married wife,<WH1166>" says<WH559> Yahweh.<WH3068>

"Enlarge<WH7337> the place<WH4725> of your tent,<WH168> and let them stretch forth<WH5186> the curtains<WH3407> of your habitations;<WH4908> don't<WH2820> spare: lengthen<WH748> your cords,<WH4340> and strengthen<WH2388> your stakes.<WH3489>

For you shall spread out<WH6555> on the right hand<WH3225> and on the left;<WH8040> and your seed<WH2233> shall possess<WH3423> the nations,<WH1471> and make the desolate<WH8074> cities<WH5892> to be inhabited.<WH3427>

"Don't<WH3372> be afraid; for you shall not be ashamed:<WH954> neither be confounded;<WH3637> for you shall not be disappointed:<WH2659> for you shall forget<WH7911> the shame<WH2659> of your youth;<WH5934> and the reproach<WH2781> of your widowhood<WH491> you shall remember no more.<WH2142>

For your Maker<WH6213> is your husband;<WH1166> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> is his name:<WH8034> and the Holy One<WH6918> of Israel<WH3478> is your Redeemer;<WH1350> the God<WH430> of the whole earth<WH776> shall he be called.<WH7121>

For Yahweh<WH3068> has called<WH7121> you as a wife<WH802> forsaken<WH5800> and grieved<WH6087> in spirit,<WH7307> even a wife<WH802> of youth,<WH5271> when she is cast off,<WH3988>" says<WH559> your God.<WH430>
"For a small<WH6996> moment<WH7281> have I forsaken<WH5800> you;<WH1419> but with great mercies<WH7356> will I gather you.<WH6908>

In overflowing<WH8241> wrath<WH7110> I hid<WH5641> my face<WH6440> from you for a moment;<WH7281> but with everlasting<WH5769> loving kindness<WH2617> will I have mercy<WH7355> on you,<WH559>" says Yahweh<WH3068> your Redeemer.<WH1350>

"For this is like the waters<WH4325> of Noah<WH5146> to me;<WH7650> for as I have sworn that the waters<WH4325> of Noah<WH5146> shall no more go over<WH5674> the earth,<WH776> so have I sworn<WH7650> that I will not be angry<WH7107> with you,<WH1605> nor rebuke you.

For the mountains<WH2022> may depart,<WH4185> and the hills<WH1389> be removed;<WH4131> but my loving kindness<WH2617> shall not depart<WH4185> from you,<WH1285> neither shall my covenant of peace<WH7965> be removed,<WH4131>" says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> who has mercy on you.<WH7355>

"You afflicted,<WH6041> tossed with storms,<WH5162> and not comforted, behold,<WH7257> I will set your stones<WH68> in beautiful colors,<WH6320> and lay<WH7257> your foundations<WH3245> with sapphires.<WH5601>
I will make<WH7760> your pinnacles<WH8121> of rubies,<WH3539> and your gates<WH8179> of sparkling jewels,<WH68> and all your walls<WH1366> of precious<WH2656> stones.<WH68>
All your children<WH1121> shall be taught<WH3928> of Yahweh;<WH3068> and great<WH7227> shall be the peace<WH7965> of your children.<WH1121>

In righteousness<WH6666> you shall be established:<WH3559> you shall be far<WH7368> from oppression,<WH6233> for you shall not be afraid;<WH3372> and from terror,<WH4288> for it shall not come near you.<WH7126>
Behold,<WH1481> they may gather together,<WH1481> but not<WH657> by me:<WH4310> whoever shall gather together<WH1481> against you shall fall because of you.<WH5307>

"Behold,<WH1254> I have created the smith<WH2796> who blows<WH5301> the fire<WH784> of coals,<WH6352> and brings forth<WH3318> a weapon<WH3627> for his work;<WH4639> and I have created<WH1254> the waster<WH7843> to destroy.<WH2254>

No weapon<WH3627> that is formed<WH3335> against you will prevail;<WH6743> and you will condemn<WH7561> every tongue<WH3956> that rises<WH6965> against you in judgment.<WH4941> This is the heritage<WH5159> of the servants<WH5650> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and their righteousness<WH6666> which is of me,<WH5002>" says Yahweh.<WH3068>
